text: "Crush with Eyeliner" is a 1995 song by American alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the fourth single from their ninth studio album Monster (1994). It went to number 4 in Iceland, number 21 in Ireland, number 23 in the United Kingdom, number 28 in Canada, number 45 in Belgium and number 55 in Australia. It did not chart in the United States. == References == Category:1995 songs Category:R.E.M. songs Category:Garage rock songs Category:Glam rock songs
title: Crush with Eyeliner
